group_1.textRight: Oh… You want to move Chisato to tears…

group_1.textLeft: She's not… It's not that she's the kind of person@who never cries.
I'm just curious to try, that's all.

group_1.textRight: Sounds great! Let's do it!@I love that sort of thing!
An Opening Night that will stir your heart…

group_1.textLeft: It could be a movie about how you two met,@and your life until now…maybe?

group_1.textRight: That's what you do for weddings, Mikura…

group_1.textLeft: Besides, for various reasons, it would be@difficult to put it to film.

group_1.textRight: Oh yeah, 'cause you're from another world.
Geeze, I'm saying that like it's an everyday@occurrence.
Then perhaps a montage of your memories@in Kamihama? Or would that be too cliché?

group_1.textLeft: No, if anything, corniness is exactly the sort@of thing that would move Chisato.
…Maybe…we could do a video letter with@footage from everyone we've met.

group_1.textRight: That's sounds GREAT!@Let's do it! C'mon!

group_1.textLeft: Seems like you've made up your mind.@Let's get moving.

group_1.textRight: Hmm… A video letter?

group_1.textLeft: Oh my! Where should I start?

group_1.textRight: Woah, let us help with the video letter too!
As soon as the subject comes up, I have no idea@what to talk about.

group_1.textLeft: How about the day we first met them?
…Here's the footage I took.@What do you make of it?

group_1.textRight: Yes, I knew having you do this was@the right choice.
Right, the sense of unfamiliarity actually@adds an intriguing touch.
The footage looks all good! Onto the editing!
…Now you just plug that video into here.

group_1.textLeft: Yes…like so?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, yeah, doesn't this look great@for a first-timer?

group_1.textLeft: Thank you very much…

group_1.textRight: …Is something wrong, Takina?

group_1.textLeft: Eh…?

group_1.textRight: You looked gloomy there for a moment.
Are you tired, perhaps?

group_1.textLeft: …No, it's not that.
It's just… I've been thinking about it, and…@I don't think it's good enough for Chisato.
I know you've gone out of your way to help me…@But…
Even if I could surprise her with my film@production skills,
when it comes to making people cry…@I don't know how to do that.
I feel like I need to do something a little more@elaborate to ensure I leave an impression…

group_1.textRight: I guess you're right.
I'd say that even though you aren't skilled,@the emotions still come across.
But let's say you're right.
You might need another weapon up@your sleeve…

group_1.textLeft: A…weapon?

group_1.textRight: But, hmm… What would it be?
Should it be technical skill?@Or knowledge, maybe…?

group_1.textLeft: …Um, there's something I've been wondering@about.

group_1.textRight: What's up?

group_1.textLeft: Are there perhaps movies in your world that@Chisato doesn't know about?

group_1.textRight: I see… You want to surprise Chisato with@your expertise in our world's movies.
It certainly would be a blind spot for her.
She might be a movie buff, but she wouldn't be@familiar with movies that only exist here.

group_1.textLeft: Exactly. What do you think?

group_1.textRight: Right, I think it's a good idea.
I've got a masterpiece from our world that@we can watch!

group_1.textLeft: A masterpiece…?

group_1.textRight: It's a monster movie directed by Joey Yamada.
It's made by the director I respect the most@in the whole universe!
It's somewhat obscure, but do you recognize it?
For a movie buff, it'd probably at least@ring a bell.

group_1.textLeft: Director Joey Yamada…
I know I've learned a lot from Chisato.
…[wait:0.8][chara:406201:cheek_0][chara:406201:lipSynch_1]But I don't think I've heard of this one.@Sorry.

group_1.textRight: No, that's perfect!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, it'd be a good movie to show.

group_1.textRight: Resorting to knowledge of our world's movies@feels rather inelaborate.

group_1.textLeft: Well…it's a bit too late for that, isn't it?
Thank you very much.@This will definitely be a surprise for Chisato.

group_1.textRight: Maybe the shock will bring tears to her eyes?
So on the big day, you'll play that movie you@made to get her all choked up.
And, boom! You'll whip out a world-exclusive@movie! Then you'll get your waterworks! Yeah!

group_1.textLeft: Right!
